channel.title: 317Serv Development Team
channel.description:
[center][b][size=18pt]317Serv Development Team![/size][/b] The road to a better server! [/center]
Krane, go ahead and post it.
So don't lock this mods! Well, I think it's time we made one good server considering all the crappy ones out there, except Speljohan's <3. But Speljohan's isn't a group project, it's a server he is personally writing for profit :p. So I have come up with the idea of making a development team to further advance Yz85Racer's 317Serv. If you would like to join the project the format is as follows. [code] Preferred alias: Programming experience: An example of what you have done: A way other team members can contact you(Preferably MSN or IRC). [/code] [b][size=14pt]The Team: [/size][/b] [ul][li]Krane[/li][/ul] [b][size=14pt]Features: [/size][/b] [ul][li]All of 317Serv's current features.[/li] [li]Asynchronous database querying.[/li] [li]Asynchronous event management.[/li][/ul] [b][size=14pt]Pictures: [/size][/b] I will post pictures as soon as there is something to post pictures for... Well, I hope I get some people to help on the project, and I hope we can get somewhere with this.

item.title: 317Serv Development Team
item.dc:creator: @Krane Krane
item.description:
@Krane wrote:

K, I’ll talk to you on MSN.

Read full topic

item.title: 317Serv Development Team
item.dc:creator: @Logan3 Logan3
item.description:
@Logan3 wrote:

Preferred alias: Logan
Programming experience: Riotscape(cleaned allstar) Project-Epic, Project-Karil(cleaned delta then a rewritten iclarity base)
An example of what you have done: I haven’t uploaded but I can show you my base?
A way other team members can contact you(Preferably MSN or IRC). blkhairedleprichan@hotmail.com

I’m not available 24/7 or very very often but I will work a lot when I am

Read full topic

item.title: 317Serv Development Team
item.dc:creator: @Krane Krane
item.description:
@Krane wrote:

=Wow, I think I’ve had a change of mind, I’ve been looking at 317Serv and it’s really slow and buggy.
And Graham’s server has a lot of stuff I don’t really need, like the JS5 update server, etc.

Read full topic

item.title: 317Serv Development Team
item.dc:creator: @xpatx xpatx
item.description:
@xpatx wrote:

^ Do you say this because other people favor Graham then Speljohan? RS2D is a very stable framework, very great. Graham’s is also good but Graham’s isn’t good for beginner programmers. I’m not saying Krane is a beginner program, but let him test other frameworks which he could possibly improve.

Read full topic

item.title: 317Serv Development Team
item.dc:creator: @Zhydrax Zhydrax
item.description:
@Zhydrax wrote:

Use MINA <3 as your library btw you should see Grahams framework. I’m pretty sure it will eat up Speljohans framework since they use RS2D by Varek as their base from what I’ve seen… And I wouldn’t say YZ85Racer’s 317Server isn’t anything special… You should really take a look at grahams you will be surprised.

Read full topic

item.title: 317Serv Development Team
item.dc:creator: @Krane Krane
item.description:
@Krane wrote:

[center][size=18pt]317Serv Development Team![/size]
The road to a better server!
[/center]

Krane, go ahead and post it.
So don't lock this mods!

Well, I think it’s time we made one good server considering all the crappy ones out there, except Speljohan’s <3.
But Speljohan’s isn’t a group project, it’s a server he is personally writing for profit :p.

So I have come up with the idea of making a development team to further advance Yz85Racer’s 317Serv.
If you would like to join the project the format is as follows.

Preferred alias: 
Programming experience:
An example of what you have done:
A way other team members can contact you(Preferably MSN or IRC).

[size=14pt]The Team: [/size]

[ul][li]Krane[/li][/ul]

[size=14pt]Features: [/size]

[ul][li]All of 317Serv’s current features.[/li]
[li]Asynchronous database querying.[/li]
[li]Asynchronous event management.[/li][/ul]

[size=14pt]Pictures: [/size]
I will post pictures as soon as there is something to post pictures for…

Well, I hope I get some people to help on the project, and I hope we can get somewhere with this.

Read full topic
